attributes.title: worst experience
attributes.review: i downloaded the app because my beautiful generation said it was the best app ever😍 first of all it took 3 days to download which is outrageous just for some app about our ✨president✨as soon as i opened the app it i lost my eyesight by seeing the background of the app and my glasses were shattered. this orange creature was taking over my phone and started yelling at me through the phone about how stupid we are and how gen z doesn’t know what we are talking about. then my phone started shaking and bursted into a million pieces because it couldn’t handle the atrocious, racist, homophobic, sexist, and disgusting orange thing on my phone. after that i got so nauseous i fainted and fell into a coma. they rushed me to the hospital and they said that i took in too many radiation waves called cheeto destroyers. my mom was mortified and she was balling of the sight that her babygirl was in a coma from an app. trump hasn’t reimbursed my momma from the hospital bill that his harming app did to me. i woke up from the coma and started turning orange from the waves i absorbed by simply opening the app. all of my hair started falling out and the only wigs they had were this yellow short color so i had to deal with it. i started chanting “real women vote for trump” and then again fainted and when i woke up from my unconsciousness i was brainwashed with the corrupt ideals of the government. the doctors said the only way i would be back to a loving, kind person was if i got shot and they brought me back to life but it was risky because they didn’t know how it would work. i said yes because anything is better than being that horrible of a person and being brainwashed into thinking i should vote for this fat cheeto. they shot me a thousand times to make sure all of the poison would come out my body. i eventually was rushed into surgery where doctor mcdreamy and mcsteamy came to operate on me so i didn’t die. 7 days later i came out of surgery and i had orange splotches on me from the app. then doctor grey came in and stabbed me in the arm because she was brainwashed too and couldn’t help herself. none of the doctors knew what to do so we started blasting tik tok songs to bring everyone back to reality. they all started dancing 🕺🏻 because the orange cheeto was gone🥰🧚 hope y’all have a good day and keep informing people on the terrifying effects of this app.
